Reviews.Title: “Again, classic ASIAN Hilton business hotel”
Reviews.Author: Discostuu
Reviews.Content: The location is great on Orchard Road where there is plenty to do at any time of the day. The lobby and restaurant area always has a lot of activity which is a plus after a busy day. The rooms are to the point and clean with some luxury items that can be seen throughout the hotel. I would stay here for its convenience and reliability more than anything, however hard to complain of any aspect of this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Question about the charge off internet fee”
Reviews.Author: Petch03
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Hilton from 16 April to 21 April to attended FHA 2012 at Singapore Expo. Everything was fine until on my check-out day (21 April around 9.30am). The lady at check-out counter told me that we have a bill for internet fee for 2 days 53$. The internet has connected form our room or what I understand was by my room number. That very strange because we didn't use any internet during our stay. My sister used her iphone to access to internet which she opens the internet package from Thailand that used via SingTel, So, we don't have to use Hotel's internet. When we asked about the time the internet had been connected. It was 7.30 pm on 17April and 8.30pm on 18 April and we were not back to the hotel until 9 pm on both days. We had been asked the question like Have we let someone in to our room? Do you sure you didn't connect the internet? Our answer No. When we start to ask our questions how and when the internet had been connected and how it go to our room account. Our staff just said she won't charge this bill this time that let we wondering what she mean for this time. Will she put our name in some sort of list and why she let it go so easily?

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location...but starting to look a bit worn”
Reviews.Author: Jaynyc2
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this Hilton property many, many times. In Singapore new hotels seem to be opening round the clock. While this hotel is modern in comparison to Hilton Hotels in other places, compared to some of the other hotels around Orchard Road, this one is starting to show it's age. Knowing Singapore, I suspect they will begin refurbishing the guest rooms in the near future (a guess, not a fact). The location is great. Just a few minute walk to the MRT. Shopping and eating all within a stone's throw (isn't shopping and eating what Singapore is all about????). As an elite Hilton Honors member, I always hope for a room upgrade. For this visit, the hotel was fully booked. Upgrades to the Executive Floor was not possible. Love the buffet breakfast. In addition to the usual American fare, there are Japanese and Indian dishes. Eggs can be cooked to order. If they refurbish to rooms in the near future, I would up my review from 4 stars to 5 stars. Still a good property.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay away from home”
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth L
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Hilton Singapore from 5 April to 7 April 2012. This was the third time I stayed at Hilton Hotel in the last six months. Guess I didn't have to say much for my repeated stay at Hilton Hotel Singapore. My husband checked in few hours earlier than me, as my flight arrived into Singapore in the early morning. The front counter staff only took one minute to give me the card key to the room. As I was experiencing some back pain, it was nice for the concierge to insist in helping me with my luggage. The only problem was that my husband forgot to ask for a room not facing the main road. As I am a light sleeper, the morning traffic noise can be a problem for me. But my husband certainly had the most beautiful sleep. I won't hesitate to book into Hilton Hotel again for its comfortable bed and pillow, the clean room and friendly staffs who never fail to give me a smile.

Reviews.Title: “Basic, expensive Hilton”
Reviews.Author: m_gorilla
Reviews.Content: Apart from the obvious privileges of staying at a Hilton, for the money you pay, things are very basic. The rooms have started showing age, and the lobby was packed with people all the time. it is funny that everyone talks about the location in Singapore- getting to one end of the country to the other takes around 40 min. Nevertheless, Orchard road is a nice spot to be on, and there is a quaint Shawarma stand outside for a late night snack. But the biggest turn off is that they charge you for the internet! Imagine, in this day and age! In a 240 USD room! Ridiculous! Small B&Bs in Laos offer free wifi to their backpackers! Come on, there are better places on Orchard Road.

Reviews.Title: “accessible to places”
Reviews.Author: jasperjugan
Reviews.Content: stayed here for business for almost a week. the very advantage of this hotel is it is along Orchard road and a close walk to the SMRT Orchard station (around 7-10 minutes walk). hotel itself is nice, with luxurious shops inside. room is good and standard for Hilton. may stay there if business permits soon, but I would prefer the Marriott better as it is more near the shopping establishments and train station

Reviews.Title: “Good and great location. Expensive”
Reviews.Author: sandra w
Reviews.Content: We stayed with the family for 1 week. The staff was quite good specially the concierge. The food was good quality and breakfast buffet was great but staff a bit grumpy, serving from the regular eggs and bacon but also dim sums, indian food and excellent breads. The Italian restaurant upstairs was very good with a very relaxing atmosphere facing the pool. The pool is small as probably not used too much. This is more a business hotel and not a resort. Fitness is excellent with good machines. Bar staff very nice but expensive. Location is excellent and very central.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel, service & location”
Reviews.Author: sunnyholidays
Reviews.Content: It was our first trip to singapore and this hotel was perfect as a base to relax and also explore singapore. We were in an executive level room with access to the executive lounge nice to enjoy breakfast and evening canapes and drinks. (if you can afford i would go for the room type that includes lounge access) Our room was spacious and modern and had everything required. The staff were fantastic, very friendly & helpful. The location is great, right on Orchard rd which has great shopping. the gym is great and the pool area is great to swim and also look out over singapore

Reviews.Title: “Hilton Staff-one of the best in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Stan G
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Hilton Singapore in Janurary and now again in April. I just can't believe the staff; the front desk people(even though you come in at 1:30am) or the bell staff(handling special requests at 1:30am) or the people in the resturants on a busy breakfast period or even just in the elevator, the staff is unbelievable. No request is handled with anything but the best and prompt service. Even the fitness center staff is right there to help with anything you might need. The food is great also as are the rooms. I have not met the GM at this particuliar hotel, but I may run out of the CATCH ME AT MY BEST cards noting the service from as many staff that I run into. Good service is sometime hard to find, but the Hilton Singapore must have a great GM and management staff to hire and keep some great people. This would be a place I would love to come for a holiday

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, great location, great staff, roof top pool”
Reviews.Author: bluehammer
Reviews.Content: Having stayed in a number of Hilton hotels in Europe and Australia, the Hilton Singapore is certainly the best I have stayed in of the chain. Rooms are spacious and modern, gym is well maintained and serviced, roof top pool is great for a dip (and deep!) and staff are helpful and polite. Great location close to shops and restaurants and only a short cab to Clarke Quay. For business travellers this is a excellent choice and well priced, and for shoppers it is the perfect location.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel at an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Leadbelly98
Reviews.Content: This Hilton is located conveniently on Orchard road with quick access to shopping, dining and the metro. During my 7-day stay at the hotel, I received great service from the front desk, the executive lounge, and the front desk manager (Hasan Nauman). The guest room was very comfortable but the bathroom is a bit small. The fitness center is adequately large but the temperature (24C) is too high for an exercise room. I did not use The roof-top pool but it looked very nice. The one disappointing part of the hotel was the breakfast restaurant. It is cramped and has an inconvenient layout for food tables. The restaurant tries to offer too many different kinds of ethnic food (American, Chinese, Japanese, and Indian) but none of the cuisines has multiple delicious dishes. Overall, it is a very good hotel and I would return to this property when I return to Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Everything you expect from a hilton”
Reviews.Author: degtravel
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the Hilton at Orchard Rd for 2 nights. Ideal location for shopaholics. The superb botanical gardens are just a 10 minute walk away, what a relief to be able to escape the hustle and bustle of the city. Hilton does charge extra for internet access, which I find a disgrace. The room rate is high enough, they shiuld provide this as a complementary service. Apart from that, great.

Reviews.Title: “The normal base Hilton.”
Reviews.Author: BO777
Reviews.Content: These dated a little small rooms. Executive room had a balcony. Executive lounge was a nice looking and friendly service. Offers the best location.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hilton”
Reviews.Author: mnk73
Reviews.Content: It was all perfect! Nothing extravagant but nothing less that wha you expect from a Hilton brand. Though there's one differentiating factor from many other Hilton or similar hotels I have stayed over the world. The People and their behaviour. Everyone was always smiling and trying to do one extra bit to make life smoother for their guests - not a regular experience in every hotel in this category. Location is awesome - Towards one end of the Orchard road. 2 mins walk to the Orchard MRT and all the Orchard malls with shops and food courts are within easy walking distance. Taxis are readily available though towards the morning you may need to budget 10 extra minutes. We stayed for 4 nights - though spent most of the days and evenings outside; whenever we returned to the hotel we knew that a cozy, comfortable room waiting for us with all these lovely people around.

Reviews.Title: “Typical business hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sunpleaseplz
Reviews.Content: I think this hotel is overpriced. Rooms are old, breakfast OK but not excellent. It is somewhere between 4 and 5 stars. Service is very good, but I find that a norm across Singapore! Internet is payable, at 25 dollars pee day and the connection is crap. Swimming pool is not that good also.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel on Orchard Convenient to Malls”
Reviews.Author: LiangShanBo
Reviews.Content: The hotel is nice and right on Orchard Street so convenient to shopping (lots of malls). Very easy to get a taxi. Recommend checking out the basements of local malls for local food. Usually can get some excellent Hainan chicken/rice for about $3.50 SGD. Fortunately or unfortunately, depending on your viewpoint, it is also right across the street from the infamous Orchard Towers. I'm a live and let live kind of guy so didn't care. Certainly wasn't hassled walking down the street at night and lots of families were out late at night too. Rooms were fine and clean. Check-in was great (friendliest check-in people at any hotel I've been at). Gym is good (and empty of people) although could use some windows. Breakfast buffet was varied and included the usual Western and Asian dishes. Would certainly stay here again if I was in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Anticipation Plus”
Reviews.Author: TravelWorldBuff
Reviews.Content: Although I did not stay myself, I would like to comment on the anticipatory services of the Hilton Singapore Team. I sent a birthday fax to my father who stayed with HIlton Singapore for work very recently. Not only did my birthday fax make it to my father's room where it was hung ready for his return from a long day at work but the team member who received this fax took it upon themselves to send up a card from the hotel plus some thoughtful amenities. My father was so thrilled when he received these thoughtful messages. Thank you Hilton Singapore!

Reviews.Title: “Typical Hilton conveniently located”
Reviews.Author: sundomain
Reviews.Content: Booked a King Hilton Deluxe room (with breakfast) through HotelClub a few months prior to the visit. We just breezed through check in at the hotel (at about 3pm). Got a room in the 11th floor which was good because it cut off completely any noise from the streets below. The room and bathroom were typically Hilton. But the bathroom wasn't very spacious. The bathroom of an Executive room at the Carlton Hotel (4-star) is bigger. No bidet. Hilton Singapore is at a convenient location at Orchard. The location is great if you are after branded shopping. You won't find much bargains or flea markets in Orchard for budget shopping. We found a shop to buy souvenirs at the "Far East Shopping Complex" right next to the hotel. The Orchard MRT station's just a few minutes' walk away. From there, once you get to Dhoby Ghaut interchange (just two stations away), you have access to trains running on the North South (red), North East (purple) and Circle (yellow) lines; which will help you get to practically all attractions you'll visit in Singapore. On the way to the MRT station from the hotel there's a Garrett's popcorn stall selling delicious caramel and cheese flavoured popcorn; a must-try! The breakfast buffet offered good variety and the food was good. However, the staff at the buffet didn't seem polite. Room service was courteous and prompt in meeting our requests. After getting to know that we were on our honeymoon we were offered with complementary food and drinks - which was lovely. Concierge was also pleasant and helpful - especially in helping us find our departure flight details.

Reviews.Title: “Located perfectly!”
Reviews.Author: Raghuvansh
Reviews.Content: Very well located hotel, right on orchard road yet not immediately next to the malls and commercial buildings. Hard Rock and Starbucks closeby. Very good breakfast and comfortable rooms with LCD tv and radio with support for ipods and mp3 players. Very well priced as compared to similar hotels in the vicinty. Will be sure to come back!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: Nelly16
Reviews.Content: Although pretty typical Hilton it is in a nice location and very comfortable. Staff helpful and attentive. Executive lounge very good with good views over Orchard Road.

Reviews.Title: “The first time staying here and definitely sure wont be the last”
Reviews.Author: Hasea
Reviews.Content: Travelling to Singapore is nothing new to me. I've stayed in several different hotels on orchard road before. But on January 2012 was the first time for me to stay at Hilton Singapore. Surprisingly i found this was a great experience since it's location only 2 minutes away from Orchard MRT station and of course since it's located in orchard road so we have access to shopping centre and resto rows along the road. In addition, the hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. The breakfast set was a satisfaction, compare to what i had in several other hotels along orchard.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: mikaramram
Reviews.Content: There is nothing extraordinarily good or bad about this hotel. It is a standard Hilton hotel in a great location. Only disappointment that I encountered is that the bed type I had reserved through hilton.com was not available at 5:30 pm when I was checking in. I was given a choice to either wait 1.5h or take another room type...

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, Great People”
Reviews.Author: Mohanish
Reviews.Content: Stayed @ Hilton Singapore in a vacation+business travel.. It was a great experience. The pool on the roof top is fabulous. The room service menu has Indian food platters that our son loved. Proximity to orchard road shopping and MRT made travelling around for all the kid friendly activities a breeze. The people at the hotel are great as well. Would love to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Fancy Hotel”
Reviews.Author: arb85
Reviews.Content: I stayed here while on a business trip and it was very nice. The breakfast buffet is almost $30, but very delicious and a great way to start the day. The hotel is located on Orchard Rd so guests have access to what seems like an endless strip of shopping and restaurants. There's a subway station right down the street where you can pretty much access any part of the city you want. Avoid the bars in the shopping center across the street. I went up for a beer and realized it was filled with prostitutes. I don't think I would have stayed here had my company not paid because it is somewhat pricey. If you have the money do it though. I spent a night on my own dime in a hotel down the street and it wasn't nearly as nice.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hilton Property - a credit to the chain”
Reviews.Author: LBOskiBear
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough nice things about this property. The whole experience reminded me a bit of arriving in Hawaii. A calm oasis in a tropical setting. Check-in was a breeze and I was given a fantastic room. Everything is very modern and up-to-date. The room was beautifully appointed. Upon check-out, they stored my bags and offered me the use of the gym for a shower before my flight. It's also convenient to everything on Orchard Road.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Location, Reasonable Rates, Expensive food and Drinks”
Reviews.Author: Tunachaser
Reviews.Content: THe Singapore Hilton is Located on Orchard Rd. and is convienient to the MRT and shopping at the ION shopping mall. Pretty much anything that you want to eat from american to Asian and Indian selections are close by or a short hop on the MRT. I would definately advise future travellers to not have a drink in the bar as a double gin and tonic ran about $37sing which translates to about $30US. Sunday brunch seemed crazy expensive at about $100sing without champagne and I wasn't too impressed with the selection. Overall a nice place to stay if you head out for your food and drinks

Reviews.Title: “This hotel has kept its standard over the years”
Reviews.Author: ZiadR
Reviews.Content: I first stayed in this hotel years ago, in the 1980s when they had a floor of Givenchy furnished rooms. This time I thought the hotel might have got a bit 'out-dated' perhaps but it definitely has not. The staff are really good, helpful and friendly and the hotel rooms are furnished very nicely. There is a cafe in the lobby which serves excellent cakes and pastries and on the ground and Mezzanine floors, quite a selection of designer boutiques. I didn't used the health club facilities but the pool area, although the swimming pool is not very big, is on the roof and has fantastic views. I will stay here again when I am next in singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Great location,comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: Arijitable
Reviews.Content: It is located at Orchard road, adjacent to a lot of shopping malls like Ion Orchard,forum etc. I stayed here from 25th Feb to 3rd March 2012 for business purposes. The service is prompt and the check-in process was smooth. I requested a room away from Orchard road as I thought that would be quieter. I was given a room away from Orchard roadon the 17th floor(1724). The bathroom had a nice amenities kit. The bed was comfortable. The room decor was muted yet chic.The study table had a map of Singapore for tourist usage. The service was prompt and the staff very friendly. The breakfast had a nice spread and sumptous.The only problem may be in the morning it might take 15 minutes or more to get a taxi.It is better if you book a taxi beforehand. Overall a very nice hotel to stay for a business trip.

Reviews.Title: “Great but short stay”
Reviews.Author: aussiegirl14
Reviews.Content: Checked in late after a flight from HK. Was staying only one night on redemption. They did not have my requested bed type but gave me a free breakfast and late check out as compensation. When the staff found out I had a medical appointment the next day and was not sure how long that would take she extended my check out from 2pm to 4pm to give me more time. Simple but much appreciated gesture which as it turned out, I really needed! Hotel must have been newly renovated so everything was clean and bright. As this is an older hotel, rooms were actually of a good size and well furnished. There were nice sweet apples available for guests at each lift lobby.The deli downstairs had great cakes and I purchased 2 boxes of macaroons as gifts and they were beautifully packaged and presented. Did not get to try the restaurants unfortunately other than breakfast which was ample. Overall a very short but enjoyable stay and would like to go back if rates are reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, good executive room”
Reviews.Author: aerodj
Reviews.Content: I can't get too worked up about the rooms in any Hilton but this particular hotel gains praise from me for ever happy, helpful staff. We paid for a level 22 executive plus room which was well worth the extra money not least for the free fast wifi, continuous excellent food and free drinks in the executive lounge itself. You could probably live off the lounge without ever having to leave. Everything else if pretty standard stuff for a Hilton but certainly this makes for a pleasurable stay!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: Diageo
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Hilton Singapore over the weekend. I enjoyed our stay here, service was excellent. Room was satisfactory, bathroom a bit dated but the water temp was just right. Will definitely come back.

Reviews.Title: “a bit aged”
Reviews.Author: LU39
Reviews.Content: recently spent 11 nights in the Singapore Hilton and while the location on Orchard Road is great the hotel needs to watch out to not be run down soon. Room service and maintenance was generally good, but if you took a closer look you would understand where I come from. The bathroom floor did not get washed once during my stay and the ceiling did display mould - not difficult in the climate, but still shouldn't happen. The minibar contained chocolate with an expiry date in the past. Executive lounge service differed lots depending on who was on duty. The service staff were friendly and really tried hard to make this a pleasant stay - for sure. but the above mentioned points let me mark it down from 5 to 4 points.

Reviews.Title: “Best location”
Reviews.Author: Camilla_1107
Reviews.Content: we were staying at the hotel with my boyfriend for 3 nights during our trip from Bali to Delhi. The hotel is located in the best area of the city. Just go out and you get all restaurants, shops, malls, etc. The king executive room seemed a bit small and the bathroom looked even smaller. The service and stuff were very attentive and nice. As we used to get up very late we didn't get a chance to try a food there and for lunches and dinners we were always out as our friends were staying at other hotels. I've just noticed that this hotel has a pool on the rooftop apparently i had no idea about it and i love the rooftop pools so that was sad but maybe I'll try it next time I'm in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent hotel in a great location.”
Reviews.Author: AssimilatedCajun
Reviews.Content: The Hilton Singapore has everything you would expect from a five-star hotel in this part of the world: clean and comfortable rooms with lots of amenities, pleasant and attentive staff, a well-equipped gym, a swimmable swimming pool, a decent restaurant, and good views from the high-floor rooms. But this is true of any number of hotels in Singapore, so here's why I like to stay at the Hilton: -- First, the Hilton is among the less expensive of the top hotels in Singapore. This isn't saying much, because all Singapore hotels have gotten shockingly expensive over the last few years. But you're more likely to find a good corporate or other discount rate at the Hilton than at its competitors. If you're not eligible for a corporate rate, check to see if you can get the Hilton Honors "miles and money award" for about $80 plus 20,000 Honors points. -- The Hilton is right in the center of town, a block from the Orchard MRT and a short walk from the many shops, restaurants, and food stalls along Orchard road. -- On both of my recent stays I've been upgraded to the executive floor. This is virtually automatic for high-tier Hilton Honors members and is available to other guests at a reasonable price in dollars and/or Honors points. The selection in the executive lounge both at breakfast and of wines and hors d'oeuvres in the evening is diverse and appealing --- last week they even had some European red and sparkling wines along with the Australian ones that are more common in this part of the world -- and the staff at the lounge are wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “very good sleep”
Reviews.Author: chefgoosegirl
Reviews.Content: Aside from the slight delay during check-in I would say that this is a very nice hotel to stay in along Orchard Road. It's location is very near the MRT station and all the great shopping areas. Food and drinks at the executive lounge were also very good, especially during the cocktail hours. But what I loved the most though was the very good sleep I had during my whole stay because of the very comfortable sleeping amenities. I would highly recommend this hotel and would surely choose it when I go back to Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Sigapore Hilton”
Reviews.Author: BRROD
Reviews.Content: One night only in Feb 2012. One of the best locations in Orchard Ave.Ideal for Shopping, close to the Rapid Transit and a $15-$20 Singapore Dollars From Changi Airport by Cab. Choose this Hotel on price. Have stayed in more expensive Hotels in Singapore but this Hilton compares with much dearer properties. As always in Singapore the hotel dining is fairly expensive, however there are numerous "Hawker" stands in the lower levels of the adjoining buildings. (It seems that every time we go to Singapore there are more and more buildings being linked together underground with the Rapid Transit trains) An older Hotel but the rooms have been renovated to a high modern standard, staff are good and the Hotel and rooms were spotless. Best Bed I have slept in for a long time. Great Roof Top Pool.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Service”
Reviews.Author: Janey H
Reviews.Content: The location is great which is located at shopping area and just 5 minutes will be arrived the subway. Hotel Staffs are nice and breakfast is good.

Reviews.Title: “A beautiful hotel with a caring, attentive staff”
Reviews.Author: travelman00
Reviews.Content: I had the pleasure of staying at the Hilton on my first visit to Singapore Jan. 12 -23, 2012. This hotel is top-notch in my book. The desk staff, concierge, dining room and executive lounge were all great, and most helpful to this first time visitor. As a Hilton Diamond member, I was able to get a spacious, upgraded room on the club floor. It was on the side away from Occhard Road, which is quieter, as I understand from previous reviews. The lounge is very nice, and has a variety of food and beverages. Their gym is very well equipped. After a day of sightseeing, I enjoyed the rooftop pool, which was never crowded at the times I was there. Would certainly stay there again! Shopping is close by, and everything you could want or need.

Reviews.Title: “location is the high point”
Reviews.Author: whyrobby
Reviews.Content: loved my stay at this hotel with my family. nice pool at the upper level and fantastic location. come out of the hotel and start shopping. buffet breakfast was just reasonable and not very great. but no complaints.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay.”
Reviews.Author: the_savman
Reviews.Content: This is a fine hotel in a great location on Orchard Road, everything you need is within walking distance. The hotel is definitely upmarket and rooms are immaculate. The buffet breakfast is up there with the best we have experienced so if you can opt for a B&B rate I would highly recommend doing so. Exec Loung is a nice perk, but if you don't have access then there are a number of eateries nearby to suit all budgets. The Metro station is a short walk also so commuting to or from Changi Airport is no great inconvenience. We had a very comfortable stay in this Hilton and have no hesitation in giving it two thumbs up whether your purpose in Singapore is for Business or Pleasure (I'd imagine this hotel sees a lot of one night stopovers on the kangaroo route). From the airport you can take a one way shuttle direct to the hotel for S$9pp - very good value if you can locate the desk in the arrivals hall!

Reviews.Title: “Great service & rooms”
Reviews.Author: iintermagix
Reviews.Content: Checked in and check out was quick and easy. Was given room upgrade and the room and its amenities were fantastic! the rooftop pool was nice but it was not heated and the water was a bit cold in the morning. Executive lounge had a good selection of food and drinks. The breakfast in the restaurant on the lobby was ok with a mix of international offerings. Thank you to Ms. Juliati at the front desk and every one else who made our stay comfortable :-)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, clean room”
Reviews.Author: tencjedd
Reviews.Content: Standard Hilton experience with above average service. Some carpets starting to look tired. Great Orchard Road location. Can't go wrong here.

Reviews.Title: “Stay on the Club Floor with Balcony”
Reviews.Author: oznick
Reviews.Content: Decent location for Singapore, for all those shoppers; yet not in the middle of the mayhem of Orchard Rd. Old Hotel, one of those Hilton's built throughout Asia during the late 70's early 80's although they have in the last few years renovated the rooms. Unfortunately not much they can do with the bathrooms and they are still tiny! If you stay here, pay the difference and book the Club floor, it is well worth it; that is if you like your free drinks and nibbles in the evening; also take note like most hotels in the world, the windows in the rooms do not open; HOWEVER there is one set of rooms on the Club Floor with balconies and they are worth paying for; you have a bigger room and can escape the locked in feel of hotels.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL AND GREAT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: CAPTRON83
Reviews.Content: In my case this hotel lived up to it's name. We have never stayed at this property before, we have always stayed down on the other end of Orchard Rd. which tends to have cheaper hotels, cheaper shops and cheaper places to eat. However the room rate at the Hilton was great so we decided to change hotels and we were not disappointed we were able to find numerous places to eat and shop that were reasonably priced. We would stay at this Hilton hotel again. The room was great and the staff was the best of the best. I will say like all Hilton hotels the mini-bar and room service have prices that are 3 times higher than they are outside the hotel, if Hilton would just be reasonable they would sell more products in house, no one likes to be taken advantage of, management just doesn't get it.....

Reviews.Title: “Impressed!”
Reviews.Author: theprincessw
Reviews.Content: At first I thought this will be just another old Hilton hotel, since I booked this hotel merely for the location. So I was expecting a worn out shabby room, but the minute I stepped into the room I could say that the room actually exceed my expectations. Nice carpetting, sharp interior, clean, just-the-right-size and good lighting. Another thing I love is the amneties, full range of Crabtree and Evelyn. I also tried out their room service: chocolate cake for dessert (heavenly), Chinese breakfast set and also Japanese breakfast set, I think both are value for money! Other facilities like pool and gym is so-so, but yes, it was nice to have a rooftop view of Orchard from the pool. The service is the good-old Hilton fashion that I adore: helpful door men, friendly house keeping, very good room service, easy check-in and check-out process. I would actually give a five star if it weren't for the noise on Friday night, I could hear club-beats blasted on top bass from 10 or 11pm through 1am.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: GujTraveller
Reviews.Content: I was there for 7 days in the month of August 2011. The location is excellent and major malls are in the close proximity. Rooms are quite comfortable. Food and available variety is praiseworthy. Staff is very courteous and helpful. On a particular day, I was not feeling well. The staff arranged an appointment with a physician in a nearby hospital.

Reviews.Title: “Business on Orchard”
Reviews.Author: xMike
Reviews.Content: Location is the key. Good rooms with comfy bed - bathroom seems out of date. Fantastic service in reception makes me feel very welcome.

Reviews.Title: “Great overnight stay for CNY”
Reviews.Author: Louisvilletraveler52
Reviews.Content: We went to Singapore for an overnight stay to see Chinese New Year. The Hilton location on Orchard Road and near the Orchard MTS was very convenient. The room was spotless, well equipped with amenities, and very comfortable. We will use it again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Reinhouse
Reviews.Content: The Hilton in Singapore offers good accommodation. Rooms are clean and service is friendly. The location is excellent if you look for something close to the shopping malls. It is situated not far away from Orchard MRT. Very conveniently to access any other spot in the city.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Charlotte N
Reviews.Content: Excellent service by the consierge and great location for shopping. Near good transportation so you can go anywhere you want in the city.

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay at Hilton”
Reviews.Author: EnglandLiverpool
Reviews.Content: Were would I begin this review.... Well from the minute I stepped out of the taxi the feeling of being made welcome was amazing. The porter took our bags and there was no feeling of pressure as you do from some 4 or 5 star hotels. The check in was smooth, friendly and efficient. I am also staying at the hotel on the 27th Jan so they also took care of some of these requests too. The lobby is clean, spacious and comfortable. Bedroom was clean, modern with stylish table and chairs. Bed was amazing and comfortable. I think the only thing that I could say negative was that the pool was slightly on the chilly side. As the pool is on the roof top, I guess with it being cloudy did not help heat up the pool. The whole stay was great - all staff in various departments are very helpful and will go out of their way to help you.

Reviews.Title: “Great location on Orchard Rd”
Reviews.Author: smiah79
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights. The location is perfect for shopaholics as it’s on the Orchard Road. Check-in was fast and efficient and staff were very friendly even at 11pm when we arrived. We tried to get a free upgrade, but luck was not on our side! The rooms are of a good size and very clean and modern. Bathroom was immaculately clean. There was no free wifi, which is a little disappointing and the charges for Internet use are sky high. It’s much better to stroll along Orchard Rd and pop into somewhere for Internet at a fraction of the price. We got this room at a slightly reduced rate as the Hilton had a sale on and it worked out at around £130 per night. To us it seemed good value as you always know what to get with a Hilton. We did not sample the food in the hotel, but wandering past it did look good. We much preferred to eat out in Singapore as there are so many good places to eat. The pool, gym and sauna/steam room were great. It was nice to use after a long day out in Singapore. Towels and bottled water are provided. The pool was a very good size. To summarise, it’s a good hotel, lacking a little in atmosphere, but great on service, location and cleanliness. Highly recommended for a short stay in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great service, okay rooms”
Reviews.Author: RoadGuy11
Reviews.Content: The rooms are just okay, good beds but other than that nothing special....however there are a few great characteristics of this hotel: -Service - the staff is terrific! Very attentive, personal service. -Location - excellent location on Orchard Road close to great shopping and the MRT -il cielo - the rooftop italian restaurant is a jewel. small but extremely well designed with very good service and excellent food, highly reccomended! -Executive Lounge - always a winner, evening happy hour a real plus in an area where drinks are expensive! This place blows away the Sheraton Towers - will be switching to the Hilton for future SIngapore trips!

Reviews.Title: “A little dated?”
Reviews.Author: jaral1202158
Reviews.Content: It is always a great stay but the reality is the Hilton is a little old, dated and the rooms, particularly the bathrooms are small. The location is wonderful, in fact it would be hard to better. The staff are couteous, friendly and efficient. The Hilton exudes a calm and solid atmosphere The buffet breakfast is well worth the money and a great way to start the day. The in-hotel shops not as expensive as you might imagine. The front office staff very kindly arranged a late check out for us.

Reviews.Title: “Great Singapore stay”
Reviews.Author: PeteBentley
Reviews.Content: I found the service at the Hilton Singapore to be extreemly good. I was quickly recognised as a HH member, given a free upgrade, and a late checkout. They did the same for my friend, who is not currently a HH member (but will be soon). The roof top pool is very nice, and looks fabulous at night. Not sure about the roof top restaurant being Italian? Would have preferred an Asian inspired restaurant. The location is great for restaurants and shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: thomas v
Reviews.Content: First of all a great location. It cannot be faulted if you are there for shopping or just want to be in the hustle and bustle of Singapore. Even so once you walk inside the complex it's calm and quiet. I stayed in one of the Executive rooms and was a little disapointed with the size of the room and the bathroom. The bathroom in particular. I had complimentary internet but this was very average signal in my room. I would recommend going to the executive room when needing to use it. Overall it was worth staying there for the location on orchard street, but I don't think I would bother with the executive room unless i recieved a free upagrade, I dont think the normal rooms could be much different than the one I was in.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel suffers from competition...”
Reviews.Author: tumbleweed67
Reviews.Content: I don't recall how many times I've stayed at the Hilton in Singapore. It feels like a home away from home, or so it did. We just returned from our most recent visit and it seems as if management is starting to let things slip a bit. It's a Hilton, so it's not the 'best of the best', but a solid 4-star quality. I had originally booked a room, then changed my reservation to a suite (or so it said on the website). Our trouble started at check-in with staff unable to explain what I had booked, what I was going to get etc. It was all very confusing. Our room was very nice, although you can tell that the hotel is aging and could do with a refurbishment. As travelers from Europe, our flights always leave at around midnight, so I usually check out around 9-10 pm. This has always cost me half a day's charge extra, with I find worthwhile. No mention upon check-in (I told them we'd check out late) I guessed it would be sama-sama… But alas, on the final day, we had two phone calls from the executive lounge and one visit from the same to ask us again when we'd leave. Still no mention of charges… At six pm our room keys stopped working, effectively locking us out of the hotel (you need the key to use the elevator), and also the Internet stopped working. The explanation was "late check-out stops at six pm" later on when we mentioned this. Quite embarrassing to be stuck in an elevator with other guests and your keys don't work… At check-out they tried to charge us for a full day extra (for the three extra hours from 6-9 pm) eventually they relented, but a regular visitor was disappointed. Communication could've been handled a lot better. There was a time when you felt welcome at the Hilton Singapore, this time we felt like an inconvenience to the, although we spent lots of money… I did like the food at the new roof restaurant with very nice dishes and the breakfast buffet is still one of the best I know. Given the increasing competition from the Marina Bay and Sentosa resorts, I think the 'old' city hotels need to work harder to keep their customers. Treating their customers well is a given first step. Shape up!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: SWGH123
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Hilton for three nights on business - working long hours and getting minimal hours to catch up on sleep. The Hotel is vdery comfortable, quiet and clean as you would expect from a HIlton. During the week nights we only got to bed after business dinners well after midnight - and the place was very quiet so easy to drop off to sleep. On Friday it was a bit more frenetic and level 13 seemed to have a lot of very noisy people up and about after midnight - including a family with small children that were talking loudly as they returned to their room next to mine at 12pm. That said I still managed to sleep well and managed to sleep in until 9am the next morning without getting disturbed by housekeepingn which was great. The in room airconditioning is adjustable to ensure you have control over the temperature. The room I had was a standard room with king size bed (nice and firm - although the pillows were all a bit to bulky) and a small ensuite bathroom with a shower over the bathtub. Breakfast was served daily in the downstairs restaurant and it offers a very wide selection of buffet items - continental and cooked breakfast. The rooftop pool bar is a pleasant place to have a drink in the evening if your programme permits.

Reviews.Title: “Business Friendly Hotel in Heart of Orchard Street”
Reviews.Author: JoshBillings
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very expensive for the quality of the property / accommodations. The location was great - on Orchard next to Orchard Subway stop. Easy to run to gardens and to Orchard Park. Great rooftop pool and very nice workout center with a separate wood floor / kicking bag room.

Reviews.Title: “business is number one”
Reviews.Author: CorporateFlyer
Reviews.Content: This is a good business hotel, rooms quite big and very quiet. It is getting a bit tired and could revamp room. Executive Club is not luxurious, but service excellent and a goiod healthy european style breakfast served. One disappointment was "free WiFi" was only if you were physically in the executive lounge, if I wanted to access WiFi in room there would be an additional cost (eventhough same system). This was not really clear in the room rate description.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: pvakhar123
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic hotel. Right near all malls, shopping and restaurants

Reviews.Title: “OK Hotel - No Free Internet”
Reviews.Author: BrainSnag
Reviews.Content: In a connected city such as Singapore you would think that a Hilton Hotel would offer free internet to gold status members. Not here, you have to be diamond. Quite idiotic in my opinion not to offer it. I was more connected to the Internet in main land China than I was in Singapore. Rooms are as they are in every other Hilton in the world. Same thing and I call them "Anywhere in the World" rooms. It's all the same. If you want something unique to Singapore spring for Raffles which I recommend highly for something different. In addition you get no points if you book with Expedia or another provider. Perhaps a standard practice, but unless you ask the hotel to add the stay to your Hilton itineraries you don't get any of your Silver, Gold, or Diamond status benefits. Contact Akiko.Matsumae@hilton.com if you would like to get your stay added to a HIlton itinerary. Just don't expect any points. Free water bottles and a newspaper every day is better than nothing I suppose.

Reviews.Title: “Hilton as expected”
Reviews.Author: RANJ2010
Reviews.Content: Excellent location, Excellent room, Excellent Breakfast, Wonderful Conference Place, Shopping Arcade, Excellent Service. We stayed for couple of days to participate in a conference held during 16th – 18th Nov’11. Customer Service is appreciable. Food quality including Indian food served in the conference lunch / dinner was excellent. The meeting place near the pool on 24th floor was superb.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible service, we were told rooms would be available at 5 30 so we came by 5 45. We were then told to wait for 45 min and fin”
Reviews.Author: Jaimessi
Reviews.Content: Terrible service, we were told rooms would be available at 5 30 so we came by 5 45. We were then told to wait for 45 min and finally given one of the rooms at 8 20 after telling them we had 2 tired and hungry kids sitting in the lobby for 2 and a half hours!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: 123travels
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel in early December 2011 for 3 nights on vacation. Great location with bus stop right outside hotel. Everyone was very friendly and helpful there, especially Front Desk Amalina. She was cheerful, professional and offered some good suggestions for places to visit. Room was modern-looking and very clean. Good housekeeping job and pretty spotless. Rooftop pool offered excellent views of Singapore and Orchard Road. Would have been nice to have a hot-tub there to relax the muscles a bit after a long walk but jumping into the pool after a hot day is equally as good. Breakfast was also delicous. Variety was decent but good quality and food was fresh. The 2 Performers at night time in the lounge played and sang some good jazz music...perfect to relax and enjoy a drink or two... Only complaint is not really related to the hotel itself but rather the Orchard Towers is right across from the hotel...somewhat noisy there and lots of prostitutes frequent the Towers; however, still very safe location and never had a problem. Would definitely stay again at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The good and the bad....”
Reviews.Author: SolskjaerZA
Reviews.Content: I have just completed a 3 night stay at the Hilton Singapore. Firstly, the good points; the hotel is situated on Orchard Road, which is the main road in Singapore. It is near to many shopping malls and restaurants, so the location is ideal. The hotel rooms and bathrooms are showing their age but are comfortable nevertheless. The concierge at this hotel is one of the best i have ever encountered in my life. They were always smiling and willing to help, at any time of the day or night. My biggest complaint with the Hilton Singapore is the check-in service. I arrived at the hotel at 3pm (check-in time is 2pm). I was made to wait till 5pm in the lobby for my room. I had just completed 24 hours worth of flying and the last thing i expected was for my room not to be ready. Two days later some other family members of mine checked in to the same hotel and were also made to wait past 5pm for their rooms. I think it is totally unacceptable for a 5 star establishment to treat their guests this way. The management at Hilton Singapore seriously needs to get its act together.

Reviews.Title: “Very satisfied”
Reviews.Author: helenandfrank
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed 3 nights in early December. Everything was very good (except for the fridge...more later) and we were very satisfied with the staff, the room, the food and the general environment in the hotel. The hotel was ideally located for shopping the for the beautiful Christmas lights on Orchard Rd. We were in a room at the back of the hotel, which we found very quiet. The room was very clean and although the hotel is showing its age in some places we found it to be a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The only issue was our in-room fridge was not working when we arrived and was still not working when we left despite 4 calls for assistance. A bit odd? Nevertheless, the hotel is recommended.

Reviews.Title: “A stay well worth the money”
Reviews.Author: nancledra53
Reviews.Content: Back home from work away from Bangkok - my partner at home alone for 3 months and all the flooding etc, that did not affect our property. As a treat I organised 2 nights away in Singapore and via one of the travel links here in Trip Advisor, booked to stay at the Hilton Singapore in Orchard Road. Previously we had stayed up above Orchard Road in Mount Elizabeth but the 2 hotels were not worth the money to be honest. I'd stayed at the Hilton Paddington in London a few times and enjoyed my stay there. So, I thought, why not try the Hilton in Singapore. Excellently located for the Ion Centre, Wisma, and all the Orchard Road shops and restaurnats that we know, trust and enjoy. Check in was flawless - in fact we had a one point 3 staff checking us in. I had mentioned that I got e-mails from hilton from a previous registration and suddenly a Hilton HHonours form was produced and duly filled in. Check in took a few minutes. The process was very friendly and cutreous. We were on the 8th floor a vay down the corridor on the left. Staff were cleaning/changing other rooms and we were greeted by them in a very friendly manner. We opted to do shopping immediately. I liked the fact that the hotel had placed by the phone a notice to call if we required the beds to be turned down. Very good - no disturbance. After the first haul of shopping - I connected to the internet - $25 for 1 day - (no 2 day option - sadly) the set up was easy and fast (Al Manzil from a previous post please note). There was a messsge bleep on the phone which turned out to be a recorded welcome. I don't know why hotels do this as the welcome at check-in is sufficient. It's a small annoyance but an annoyance non-the -less. Two slight problems with the room. The door did not close fully indeed there was quite a space atthe top of the door and below. we had to push the door fully to enable the security device to close properly. Later walking down the corridor we noticed a few doors in the hotel with a gap at the top of the door. Not very good for sound control from noises outside the room. Secondly, there seemed to be no way to activate the plug in the bath to allow the water to drain out the bath/shower. I got really frustrated trying to drain the water away - eventually allowing the water to drain naturally through a gap in the plug. Now to the good thing. The room was spacious and very clean. The room was cool and the air con was on when we entered the room. The twin beds were large, with good bed coverings and pillows - the linen was crisp and clean. The room lighting was good - not one of these places with light switches all over the place where you had to spend 20 minutes or so trying to brighten the room by switching on all the ambience lighting. One switch for the bathroom and one switch helpfully marked Main Lighting! Congratualtions Hilton Singapore. There was one table lamp for work with the computer if I needed it. The TV was flat screen and a DVD player connected which pleased my partner very much. Over 50 world Wide Channels on the TV and I was pleased that all the channels were listed correctly and worked. The second and final night we decided to use room service - and had a superb meal brought to us by the room service staff.. My US beef stake was perfectly dome and you could slice through it like the proverbial hot knife through butter. Well done room service staff. The next morning - check out was just as speedy and polite as the check in. No pain or bother. I enjoyed my stay at the Singapore Hilton and will stay again when the opportunity arises. I am happy to recommend the Hilton Singapore. I certainly got my value for my money.

Reviews.Title: “Efficient and Central”
Reviews.Author: Janet C
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel The staff did all that they could to make us welcome after a long journey. It is worth spending extra on the executive rooms.These are quieter, larger and have extras such as a dressing gown.This standard also allows you to use the executive club room, this provides a good place to have a free drink in the evening and relax with other guests away from work and your bedroom. This good for lady guests who do not want to hang around a bar but want a safe place to to socialize or use the free wifi.

Reviews.Title: “Singapore stop over”
Reviews.Author: alastair4
Reviews.Content: I usually stay at the Hilton Singapore when on a stop over to China. Like many Hilton hotels around the world the location is excellent but the hotel itself is a little tired. This hotel has had the rooms renovated so they are modern, clean and well appointed. The staff are very friendly and helpful and taxis are not a problem. The pool and gym area is very good and worth taking advantage of this.I find Singapore hotels are becoming more expensive so it is worth booking in advance if you have the opportunity.

Reviews.Title: “Singapore Hilton”
Reviews.Author: Cilantro15
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently stayed at the Singapore Hilton and had a wonderful experience. We arrived at 4:30 am after a long-flight and the on-duty staff was very helpful in making sure we had a place to clean-up as we were not scheduled to check-in until 2pm. In fact, they got us into the gym for a workout and then we could use the facitlites there to clean-up afterwards.. We then went to the lounge for breakfast and then by 8 am they let us know our room was ready to check-in.. We both were so happy to have such a high level service and friendly folks willing to help out after a 20 hour plane flight. I cannot say enough good things about this Hilton. The staff, food, location was perfect. I would highly reccomend this Hotel to anyone going through Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel”
Reviews.Author: MichaelParisFrance
Reviews.Content: My fourth time at Hilton Singapore! I'm always looking for good location and possibly in Hitlon hotels as I'm privileged guest. Location: excellent and probably one of the best in Singapore Hotel: classic hilton hotel, friendly staff at the exec level Room: clean and nice and functional Price: expensive but fair for Singapore

Reviews.Title: “Best EVER”
Reviews.Author: dennis h
Reviews.Content: Having traveled all over the world I have to admit the Singapore Hilton is in the top shelf in EVERY catagory. The rooms are very clean and well appointed, the staff is over the top helpful and responsive. Johan Lindholm - Director of Operations went way above and beyound when he learned that is was our wedding anniversary. He made dinner reservations, arranged for chocolate strawberries in the room, and much more. The breakfast in the morning was awesome with a large assortment to choose from. The pool on the roof is fantastic and the drinks on the roof in the evening is very romantic. Easy access to airport, shopping, and all the sights. I cannot say enough about this great hotel except to say WOW! what a GREAT HOTEL, STAFF, MANAGEMENT, and Facilities. Keep it up and see you again soon.

Reviews.Title: “NICE!”
Reviews.Author: StefSalamun
Reviews.Content: Pardon for the backdated review as I stayed there on July 2011. Located on the Orchard road was the main reason I choose this hotel. Just a short walk for less than 5 minutes, you found yourself in shopping center galore in Singapore. Transportation also did not become a problem during our stay. The hotel was fantastic! Room was perfect. it was spacious, they put the small bowl with "jewelry" written on it, so thoughtful! they even arranged our things that we left messy on the bathroom (such as cosmetics and all) nicely and put towel below. which is rarely in most of hotels! The one that I really fond of from the room is the amenities! I really love it! even my friend who came to visit me at the hotel was jealous that I pampered with such good amenities. Too bad I haven't got a chance to try the swimming pool and other facilities. But I would love to come back to this hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: matulessy_alice
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the hotel on 18 October 2011 for 5 nights. I would say it was one of the best hotels i have ever stayed. The hotel was fantastic, the location was excellent close to all shopping areas, the room spacious, the bathroom was big, facilities were great, breakfast was brilliant, staff were friendly and very helpful, cleanliness was spotless. All and all was fantastic! I would very highly recommend the hotel to everyone to stay, either for business or holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Style and service”
Reviews.Author: KookaburraSydney
Reviews.Content: Located on Orchard Road this hotel is very close to some of Singapore's newest shopping complexes and a short walk to the city's very efficient metro trains. I found the staff helpful, friendly and efficient, especially when I requested a room change to the back of the hotel as I found the noise from the traffic on Orchard Road made it difficult for me to sleep. The rooms are modern and stylish and the beds beautifully soft, unlike the firm beds you often find in Asian hotels. The buffet breakfast is excellent with huge choice. The hotel is located at the end of Orchard Road furthest from the airport so if you arrive at rush hour as I did expect a longer cab ride or take the train!

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant ....”
Reviews.Author: Matt G
Reviews.Content: One of the best hotels that I have ever stayed in. Staff are very friendly and attentive to all of your needs. As a Diamond VIP Hilton member I got upgraded on each occasion that I have travelled here to a better than booked room making my stay more pleasant. Orchard road is busy with shopping a plenty and lots of eating places. The Hotel is very convenient, clean and well appointed and a great business location for all districts. Can't wait to come back and see you all

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: casomesh
Reviews.Content: Good Hotel for business or pleasure trip. I liked their breakfast which had Indian veggie menu everyday. So felt like home away from home. The staff was courteous and made the stay pleasant. In Singapore, I will return to this one again and again.

Reviews.Title: “Close to shopping and train”
Reviews.Author: cpagia
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a few nights. Service was very good, room was what you would expect from Hilton. We got a good deal, so we very pleased with everything. The hotel is quiet inside, but right amidst the hustle and bustle of Orchard Rd and the malls and shops. If you fancy moving further afield, it is a short (and cheap) taxi ride down to the waterfront, and a train is also close by to whisk you pretty much anywhere with Singaporean efficiency. If you like walking, the main waterfront area is certainly doable, a moderately long but flat walk away. I recommend eating at Iggy's onsite at least once. It is one of the best in the world and good value at $SG85 for lunch. Will have to try the more expensive dinner next time I visit! In summary, a pretty standard Hilton, if you've stayed at one before you'll know what to expect. Just be aware of the position along Orchard Rd away from the waterfront. Given the excellent transportation options in Singapore this is not really an issue, just worth bearing in mind.

Reviews.Title: “Nice location”
Reviews.Author: Poppies99
Reviews.Content: Excellent location on Orchard road with close proximity to MRT and many shopping centre. We stayed here as part of Singapore Stop-over package and stayed in King Hilton Deluxe and room was spacious with a comfortable bed, overlooking Orchard road but very good sound proof. Expected standard from Hilton however the concierge has the same attitude that we encountered in Singapore, the "No I can't" attitude. I thought in a five star hotel when we request service, it should be met with "Yes" attitude and they should go out of their way to help you. The night we arrived there, I enquired into a recommendation for restaurant with chilli crab, first answer was "There are many but weekend is very busy". I asked if she could book a table for us at one of the restaurant that my friend recommended, the answer "Weekend is busy and it's probably booked out" without even trying. Anyway, I got into a taxi, turned up at the restaurant and got a table straight away.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location & Good Service”
Reviews.Author: budgy26
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last October and found the location is so perfect. It was raining a lot during the week but we can walk 2 minutes to Wheelock , went down the escalator to ION where Orchard MRT, ION Food Courts and lots of stores,and continue walking to Wisma Atria with more Food Court and shops or crossed ( still ) underground to Lucky Plaza or continue walking to Takashimaya. Up to the road level walk for 2 minutes to Somerset 313 with newer Food Court at the top level and Somerset MRT underground. We were booked for regular room and soon found out we had to pay extra for our daughte'sr extra bed plus our breakfast if we choose so. So we asked ( we were not offered ) the rate for upgrade to Executive/business room rate and we found it is cheaper to upgrade, particularly we need the Internet access. The Tea Time at the Business Lounge offers various type of snacks from savoury satay, pizza, cheese, sushi to mini cakes accompanied by choices of soft drinks, beer, champagne, wine. The lounge tends to be very full around the first hour and one time the waiter/attendant told me to come back later. When we were there the lounge was always crowded with people talking rather too loud. Unfortunately this is the only place you can have internet access- since you have to pay extra if you wish to have access in your room; consequently half of the patrons in the lounge are working on their laptops.If you do have an executive room, ours was in 21st fl which has stairs to the 22nd Fl where the Business Lounge is; try to avoid room 2118 since it has a connecting door to the Club suite room and its door is just almost side by side to the Club Suite double door. One night We could not sleep due to the rowdy neighbour. Bathroom here is very small but very clean. Breakfast downstairs was adequate but it is not as good as at the Hilton Hanoi. I would have expected a bit more options on their buffet considering the extra $$ one pays for breakfast. Lobby is small with not many sofas to sit on. The rate we paid after upgrade to Executive which includes one extra bed, breakfasts for three and access to business lounge was S$ 570 per night; Service Charge Room S$ 57, Room GST S$ 43.89 pernight. You pay for local phone + its GST. The hotel has good Gym and smallish pool on the 23rd Fl. Would I stay here again ? I would but perhaps I would book via internet.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, but check room rates.”
Reviews.Author: FdV62
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Hilton in Singapore for 4 days as part of a business trip. The hotel is well situated in Orchard Road and has nice, relatively, spacious rooms. They initially had me booked in an executive room which gives access to a lounge on the top floor of the hotel, breakfast and free Internet. I did not need that and changed to a regular room (which was actually the same room...). As there are many good breakfast places in close proximity to the hotel (Starbucks, The Coffee Bean, Coffee Club, etc.), it is better and much cheaper to have breakfast there. The coffee is much better as well. Further the hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. It does make sense to check online room rates even during your stay especially around peak times. The hotel tends to continue an initial high rate (due to peak occupation) for the whole duration of your stay. This can lead to significant differences and save you up to S$150 per night! If you believe that this review was helpful, please indicate that below.

Reviews.Title: “Close to everything”
Reviews.Author: NewxGate
Reviews.Content: Spent two nights here, this is my second visit to the hotel, the first was back in 1987, so it has been awhile. As the other reviews have stated, it is very close the ION centre and all that Orchard Road has to offer. I decided to travel to the hotel by the MRT from Changi Airport . It only cost’s $2.10 plus $1.00 deposit for the electronic ticket, which you can then get back at the end of journey by putting the ticket back in the ticket machine and getting a refund, The journey on the MRT is quick and simple, it takes about 40 minutes and requires two changes of train. The first is at Tanah Merah and then City Hall. Each change is a simple walk across the platform to the next train with no stairs to negotiate (this applies to both directions). The only problem comes at Orchard Road station and finding the correct exit. Look for ION Patterson and the Patterson Road exit. The ION Centre is on the corner of Orchard and Scotts/Patterson Roads. It is a very big and busy intersection and you can’t cross at street level. Unless you have lots of luggage, try the MRT and save the cab fare to spend in the shops. The hotel is close to convenience stores and restaurants, conventional and fast food. My room was well equipped with a king size bed, desk, comfortable chairs and was very well lit. The air conditioning worked well, my only complaint about the rooms was the mini bar. I never use the mini bar, but always look and laugh at the prices, but if I did want too, everything was warm as it didn’t appear to be either switched on or plugged in.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: CanberraJenny
Reviews.Content: Lovely hotel right on Orchard Road. Breakfast in Executive Lounge was good.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location in happening place”
Reviews.Author: Milanbhise
Reviews.Content: Its good hotel with excellent location. Rooms are well kept, modern and excellent. I have stayed here before. Make advance reservations to get better rate. Staff is very friendly and helpful. In this hotel you are near to everything. Good restaurant down. MRT is close by. Plenty taxis available all the time.

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location”
Reviews.Author: tony007ve
Reviews.Content: I had very high expectations from this hotel; by walking trough the lobby you will expect a "busy" hotel full of guests (mainly business travelers). As Hilton VIP Diamond, I got an upgrade to executive room, even though I had cash+points stay; but I didn't have the lounge access; I spoke with Grace, who, after talking with the manager, informed that the lounge is kinda "small" and it would be difficult to accomodate an extra guest. I ask again, trying to push this time a little harder by mentioning that the "executive" room was not such (I went and saw the room and was small). She talked with the manager again and I got the lounge access (well worth it). The room was small IMO, with nice crabtreen and evelyn amenities; super king bed and view to Orchard Road. The lounge was well equipped with spirits, fruits, and food. The breakfast and afternoon tea were great, so was the evening dishes (sushi someone?). The hotel is walking distance to ION orchard, tangling shopping centre, Shaw Cinemas, Orchard MRT station, Forum mall (full of kids stores, including Toys R' Us). From Orchard MRT, taking one station, will put you at Somerset MRT with Centrepoint, Paragon, Takashimaya stores etc. Overall a great stay and I will definitely recommend for people trying to have some serious shopping.

Reviews.Title: “A very comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: SaketG31
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Hilton Singapore for 3 days. It was one of the very good 5 star hotels I have stayed so far. The ambience, service, courtesy of staff, promptness was amazing. Language is no problem. The reception staff & concierge will help you as much as they can. The only problem is that they do not use green & red stickers for food, so one has to ask about the contents of each & every food item kept on the menu. Being an Indian veg, one is left with choice of breads, pastries & fruit. The pasta was exceptionally good. The breakfast had variety of indian food especially south indian, so that one can survive on heavy breakfast till evening. I am looking forward to staying at same hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in the city center”
Reviews.Author: ca_lovers
Reviews.Content: Excellent staff, very clean rooms and great breakfast. The hotel is located near the high class shopping area of the city. The hotel is well suited for both business and leisure stays. Public transport is not a problem from the hotel, which is a 20min drive by taxi from the airport. Staff is efficient and friendly. I have stayed here multiple times and will come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Central location, beautiful hotel”
Reviews.Author: noleave-nolife12
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Hilton for about 5 nights in August 2011. Room was spacious, quiet, clean and comfortable – pretty much everything you would expect from any up market hotel. Housekeeping service was also great – and by the amount of tidying they did you could tell they certainly paid attention to detail! We only ate breakfast at the hotel, but were impressed with the buffet spread of hot and cold dishes. In terms of its location, the hotel is ideally located in Orchard Road, close to many shopping centres, places to eat and an MRT station. There is also a supermarket across the road (it is a little hidden, but ask the concierge to show you where to go). All staff we interacted with were very friendly and courteous. The only exception was the staff member who served us at checkout – she must have had a bad morning as we found she was quite grumpy. All in all we had a great stay, and would come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Get With It, Hilton! Provide Free Internet.”
Reviews.Author: LittleBearsBed
Reviews.Content: Many staff around to say they're "sorry", but too many reasons to say they're sorry. It took awhile to check in. One of our card keys didn’t work. Internet usage was the price of a hotel with better service. We had access to use the business lounge one morning, but again the card key didn’t work. Every little thing and movement you make has its price. Copy machine charge was ridiculous. Receptionists weren’t compitant. Everyone seemed freshly hired. The price of a room didn’t match up to the service. The bed was comfortable and the room had a flat screen TV. Everything really was clean. The location on Orchard Road was perfect if you wanted to go shopping, reach the subway, or go out to eat. Good sized pool on the roof. Clean bright room with stiff service.

Reviews.Title: “hilton for singapore”
Reviews.Author: onthetrailagain42
Reviews.Content: It is book well in advance you can get some great deals. It is a perfect location for tourism, the food is good and it connects to the Four Seasons which has even better food. All in all and good value. Over the Christmas holidays they have a special set up for kids that is very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth L
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Hilton Hotel from 7 Sept to 10 Sept 2011. This was my first stay at Hilton Hotel Singapore, as I normally stayed at another hotel one block away. What a nice surprise. The service was immaculate, room was clean and all the staffs smile every time I look at one of their faces. They made my stay at Hilton Hotel such a pleasant and comfortable experience. I have booked to go back there again end of November. I am so looking forward to my next trip. The only problem I had while staying at Hilton Hotel was that it could be quite noisy as my room was facing the main road. Other than that I couldn't find another fault in my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, good location rooftop pool.”
Reviews.Author: ScandiCouple
Reviews.Content: Very good, and expensive. Friendly staff, good location. Recommended. Maybe a bit small rooftop pool, but still a pleasant one. (more later...).

Reviews.Title: “Location & Cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: Joshua N
Reviews.Content: This hotel has most of the things I expected, except a decent pricing. Why would I spend more for something I could have received from other hotels on orchid? Despite the $, I had a pleasant stays of 3 nights before heading to another country.

Reviews.Title: “Ageing but still reliable Orchard Road stalwart”
Reviews.Author: RPaderna
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hilton Singapore recently for a 3-day weekend. I chose the hotel primarily for its location along Orchard Road and also for the attractive room rate it offered. For shopaholics, the entire avenue where the Hilton and many other hotels are located is absolutely retail heaven. Beware though because Singapore has become a very expensive city to go shopping particularly for branded items. This Hilton is definitely showing signs of age but it is visibly well-maintained. The lobby and other public areas are not as spacious as the other deluxe hotels in Singapore so it can feel a bit crowded. The coffee shop in the lobby where breakfast is served can fill up quite fast so guests may need to queue specially during peak breakfast time. Expect typical breakfast buffet fare, with a variety of hot & cold items on offer. I felt that the breakfast was uninspiring but found no real reason to gripe as it was substantial & filling nonetheless. The standard room given to me appears to be recently renovated. Although the bathroom looked a bit dated, I was completely satisfied with the in-room amenities and level of comfort offered by the room. Guests should be mindful though to triple lock the door anytime you are inside the room. I have barely settled into my room when to my horror a housekeeping staff entered my room WITHOUT knocking (the room had no door bell) to deliver a can of potato chips for the minibar. I had no clothes on when the housekeeping staff entered as I was about to take a shower. I was fuming mad at this intrusion and I shouted at the staff to leave my room at once...but she just stood there telling me that she merely wanted to deliver a can of chips....no apologies were offered! I did manage to shove her out of my room and after that I quickly donned the robe and stepped outside to speak to her. She was still there outside my room holding the can of chips. I told her that common decency dictates that people should knock first before entering any room that is not theirs. Housekeeping staff working in hotels must also announce their presence before entering a room by loudly saying "Housekeeping!" To make matters worse, the staff barely spoke English so I was not even sure if she understood me. So I decided to call the attention of the Manager on duty. He met up with me afterwards and was apologetic. He seemed to understand the embarrassment I felt and offered his apologies. Since I was satisfied with the action taken, I put the incident behind me and managed to enjoy the rest of my stay in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “You would love it”
Reviews.Author: christiane69
Reviews.Content: Best area in Singapore.Next to many shoppingcenters.Great restaurants on Orchard Road. Try a rickshaw at nighttime.Go to Sentosa Island.Singapore Zoo

Reviews.Title: “Great Location in Centre of Action”
Reviews.Author: boboakville
Reviews.Content: I was on business, but traveling with my spouse. This hotel is right in the middle of the shopping and entertainment area and quick to get to the business area. So it satisfied all requirements. I use the Hilton chain quite a bit, so it's very pleasant to be greeted at the front desk as a valued guest. The front desk was especially friendly. The rooms were up to date and with the usual amenities you'd expect from a top hotel. The breakfast, which was included in the room rate, was very good - a buffet, with lots of selection for everyone's taste. For the rest of our meals we ate outside of the hotel. I'd certainly come back on my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Pool remodel is spectacular. Daytime construction noise.”
Reviews.Author: DoesNotGetOutMuch
Reviews.Content: I stay her once year and like it. Breakfast remains a treat. Last time the pool was being redone. There is a new restaurant on the top floor now overlooking the pool - I did not try the restaurant BUT a nighttime swim was special. For those of us out of time zone, there is some construction noise mainly from the back of the hotel. It did not wake me but was noticable.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel- Internationally known!”
Reviews.Author: Smiths W
Reviews.Content: The Hilton is a class by itself. Hotel was located very conveniently in Orchard Rd, so walking down to the shops are very easy. I stayed her last year in July as well and since it was another business trip to Spore, i decided to stay at the Hitlon again. Was looking forward to see many old staff, particularly a young lady named Miss Putri Hanna. She was amazing and looked after me during my stay in the hotel.. She was at the Executive Lounge and remembered my name everytime we crossed paths at the hotel. Truly was an asset. However, to my disappointment, Miss Putri is no longer working at the hotel when i enquired with the very friendly reception. However, i was greeted by another staff, Chody and he was very helpful too! I must say, Hilton has the best service and amazing staff! Kuddos to the front office department! WIll definitely come back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but noisy”
Reviews.Author: TokyoSalaryMan
Reviews.Content: Good hotel for business. Centrally located so there is a lot to do for food, drinks etc. The breakfast was full of choices - especially liked the "healthy options" table they had set up. The miso soup was far too salty for my taste though. Rooms are nice, clean and spacious. My only recommendation would be to request a room NOT on Orchard Rd. It was really noisy and I had to use earplugs each night to sleep. I would stay here again but request a quiet room.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: Wanderl00st
Reviews.Content: I had the chance to stay at this hotel for around a week. It had great service. The location is really fab. Very well connected. The hotel staff is prompt and courteous. Would definitely like to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great rest at the Hilton”
Reviews.Author: ChristofvdH
Reviews.Content: Everything you would expect from a Hilton hotel. However the friendliness of the staff is much better than other Hilton hotels we stayed in (Australia and The Netherlands) Overall a very positive experience and the roof top pool / bar is very nice

Reviews.Title: “The pool is beautiful at night!!”
Reviews.Author: skipMelbourne
